items.sentence: Tom didn\'t want me to go to Boston with him.
Tom didn\'t want to admit that he was scared.
Tom didn\'t want to go, but Mary made him go.
Tom doesn\'t want Mary to go home by herself.
Tom doesn\'t want Mary to kiss him in public.
Tom doesn\'t want Mary to know what happened.
Tom doesn\'t want to admit that he was wrong.
Tom doesn\'t want to be seen talking to Mary.
Tom doesn\'t want to continue working for us.
Why don\'t you try minding your own business?
Why isn\'t that working? It worked yesterday.
Tom didn\'t have the courage to ask Mary out.
Tom didn\'t have the courage to disobey Mary.
Tom didn\'t know Mary used to live in Boston.
Tom didn\'t know that Mary understood French.
Tom didn\'t notice Mary hiding in the bushes.
You should take this a little more seriously.
Tom studied French last night until midnight.
Tom succeeded in finding a new job in Boston.
Tom succeeded in getting the truth from Mary.
